name: LYS Capital
description: LysCAPITAL is a DAO that will offer investment opportunities. With our knowledge and skills, we decided to form a group of like-minded people to invest in projects. They are open to anyone willing to join forces. Invest with us if you want to save time and money. With Lys Capital, make investments like a King. From our analysis of dozens of projects, we enable and share with you only the best projects in the crypto world.
